name: Illume (Team Rocket, jake-pauls, paulc100)
description:
Overview

Illume is a single-player adventure platformer where you explore the Elder Forest, a vast abstract world whose prosperity, beauty, and color relies on the earth stone - a sacred relic of the Woodsworth clan.

The story follows Jean Woodsworth and her grandpa who is the Keeper of the Forest. Each day,  Jean and her grandpa ritually bring the earth stone to the Elder Tree to maintain prosperity and perserve order in the Elder Forest.

Being only twelve, Jean is unsure of her abilities and is scared for the day she may have to become the new Keeper of the Forest...

Controls Mouse/Keyboard
  • WASD movement
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact with objects
  • F to use the earth stone
Gamepad
  • Left Stick for movement
  • South Button (A or X) to jump
  • West Button (X or Square) to interact with objects
  • East Button (B or Circle) to use the earth stone
Credits

Created by Team Rocket 🚀

Mohammed Bajaman
Paul Cavallo
June Ka
Aiden Lonquist
Jake Pauls
